timeline.significance: Beginning of professional journey in web design and development
Established base, became part of Pittsburgh design community

timeline.event: Mobile-first responsive web design advocacy begins
timeline.significance: Early adoption and teaching of responsive design principles
Comprehensive responsive design pattern library and resource
First public articulation of atoms → molecules → organisms → templates → pages framework

timeline.event: Co-created Pattern Lab with Dave Olsen and Brian Muenzenmeyer
timeline.significance: Open-source tool to implement Atomic Design, became industry standard

timeline.event: Created 'WTF Mobile Web' with Jen Simmons
timeline.significance: Advocacy project highlighting mobile web pain points
Educational resource for mobile web development
Comprehensive resource for style guide creation and maintenance
Definitive text on methodology, available free online, became seminal work
Resource for building effective style guides
Discussions on design systems and style guides with industry experts

timeline.event: Regular SmashingConf speaker and workshop leader
timeline.significance: Became go-to expert for design systems education

timeline.event: Transitioned to design system consultant full-time
timeline.significance: Dedicated career to helping organizations build design systems
Platform for discussing meaningful work and career fulfillment
Adapted teaching to remote format, expanded reach globally

timeline.event: Created 'Subatomic: The Complete Guide To Design Tokens' course
timeline.significance: Comprehensive education on design tokens architecture and governance
Advanced talk on multi-brand system architecture

timeline.event: Focus on global/multi-brand design system architectures
timeline.significance: Consulting on enterprise-scale system challenges
Addressed misconceptions, discussed methodology evolution

timeline.event: Participated in 'Design Systems Smashing Magazine Discussion'
timeline.significance: Industry dialogue on state of design systems

timeline.event: Exploring AI integration in design systems
timeline.significance: Addressing how AI affects design system workflows while maintaining principles
Exploring future of automated/AI-assisted design systems

timeline.event: Continued workshops on advanced design systems topics
timeline.significance: Teaching design tokens, governance, scalability
Continuous thought leadership on design systems evolution

foundation.focus: Web design fundamentals, responsive design emergence
foundation.key_developments: Career start, Pittsburgh move, early responsive advocacy

responsive_era.focus: Mobile-first, responsive patterns, This Is Responsive
responsive_era.key_developments: Established expertise in responsive web design

atomic_design.focus: Atomic Design methodology, Pattern Lab, book publication
atomic_design.key_developments: Created foundational methodology and tools still used industry-wide

design_systems_mature.key_developments: Full-time consultant, expanded teaching, Style Guides/Wake Up podcasts

tokens_and_scale.focus: Design tokens, multi-brand systems, AI integration
tokens_and_scale.key_developments: Subatomic course, advanced architectures, future-facing explorations
